articles.description:
RTâ€‚Kui He
Don't forget today's koinos Talk. I host the show with fellow @developer_dao member @lukemwillis. Luke is a seasoned developer and a recent crypto convert while I've been using fee less blockchains and aping since 2017. You'll get both sides of the picture on why koinos.
The Koinos Forum:â€‚Tomorrow, we're going to explain why we're all in on Koinos, in detail. We'll list why the bet is favorable and where there are going to be challenges along the ride.
â€‚https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1OwxWzEEypAJQ

nader dabit (ğŸ§±, ğŸš€) | sha.eth | nader.sol:â€‚How to get hired in DevRel in web3
1. Find a protocol / team in need of DevRel
2. Learn tech then create a good example codebase with high quality learning material around it - workshop, tutorial, video
3. Apply for a grant, get paid for your work regardless
4. Share it
5. Apply
